name: Super Recycler
description:
Super Recycler is a silly sandbox game where you play as a garbage collector.

She will have to, with her new rocket-powered boots navigate the world, while finding as much garbage as possible to recycle . To her aid she also has state of the art "trash magnets" that attracts garbage and makes her able to carry an amount of trash that should not be humanly possible.

Save the futures' dome enclosed cities from becoming destroyed with garbage! Feed the garbage eating - trash compactor-robots!  And don't trip!... Or you'll have to pick up all of the trash and ragdoll yourself back up again!

A game made by

Marve Gomes - Lead Game Designer & Product Owner

John Roddis - Lead Programmer

Yasmine Lindberger - Lead Artist

Alexander Nilsson - Lead QA

Hugo Lind - Level Designer

Max Fagerström - Systems Programmer

Kim Eklund - Prop Artist

Sofia Papathanassiadou - QA & Sound Designer
